episodes.title: Not So Simple: The Misuse of Target-Date Funds
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary: Special guest Christopher Jones talks to the guys about target-date funds and how they are widely misused. Also, Andy re-writes some misleading investing headlines.

episodes.title: The Tale of Two Funds
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary: Andy and Bob tell the tale of two mutual funds and explain why the quality of financial advice matters. Plus, some special Investing Sense Oscar awards!

episodes.title: Trump’s impact on markets
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary: Andy and Bob talk about the impact President Trump has been having on markets, particularly through his messages on Twitter, and what it means for everyday investors.

episodes.title: What Trump’s fiduciary memo really means
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary: Andy and Bob discuss the recent memorandum issued by President Trump asking for a re-examination of the conflict of interest/fiduciary rule.

episodes.title: FOMO investing mistakes
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
Bob and Andy discuss three major investment mistakes we make with our 

portfolio when we have a “fear of missing out (FOMO).”

episodes.title: Debunking 401(k) myths
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
Phil Reiff exposes 401(k) myths and action steps to take in order to avoid 

following them.

episodes.title: First 100 Days of President Trump
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
Andy and Bob discuss changes to retirement programs happening in 2017 that 

listeners need to know about.

episodes.title: Changes to Social Security and Medicare Benefits in 2017
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
Andy and Bob discuss changes to retirement benefits happening in 2017 that 

listeners need to know about.

episodes.title: What to Learn From 2016’s Worst Advisor
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
John Bunch talks about one of the worst advisors of 2016 and what listeners 

can learn from how he mistreated his clients.

episodes.title: A Look Forward and Backward
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
Andy and Bob review 2016 market activity and what listeners can learn
                from it.

episodes.title: Top Financial Topics
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
Andy and Bob highlight some of the top interviews with their panel of 

experts.

episodes.title: Understanding the Fed funds rate
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
Chris Bouffard talks about the Fed’s decision to raise interest rates and what 

it means for listeners.

episodes.title: Figuring Out Financial Advice
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
John Bunch talks about how to tell the difference between good and bad 

financial advice and how to tell if you're being taken advantage of.

episodes.title: Managing Medicare Open Enrollment
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
Bob and Andy talk with an expert about how to get the Medicare coverage you 

need without paying more than you should.

episodes.title: Preparing for Political Change
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
John Bunch discusses how investors can manage their reaction to upcoming 

political changes.

episodes.title: The 411 on 401(k)s
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
Larry Raffone discusses how the 401(k) has evolved over the years and 

adjustments you can make to optimize your 401(k).

episodes.title: Fiduciary Rule Follow-Up
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
Christopher Jones provides an update on the Department of Labor fiduciary 

rule, including the changes that it’s already brought about.

episodes.title: Minding the Markets
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
Chris Bouffard reflects on market activity so far this year and discusses what 

to expect in the remaining months of the year.

episodes.title: Avoiding Emotional Investing
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
John Bunch, president of Financial Engines advisors, discusses ways to keep 

your emotions from getting in the way of investment decisions.

episodes.title: Fixing Financial Illiteracy
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
60% of Americans have only a moderate to low financial literacy – find out 

here what steps we can take to change that.

episodes.title: Presidential Election Primer
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
JT Taylor, chief political strategist of Hedgeye Potomac Research, provides a 

nonpartisan update on the presidential election campaign.

episodes.title: All About the S and P 500 on Investing Sense
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
Andy and Bob talk with Christopher Jones about how the S 500 works, how it’s 

changing and why it may not be the best benchmark for you.

episodes.title: Are You Ready For Your RMD?
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
In this week’s show, Andy and Bob talk with Denny Smith about the importance 

of having a strategy for spending in retirement.

episodes.title: Starting Up Your 401(k)
episodes.author: info@mutualfundstore.com
episodes.summary:
Andy and Bob talk with Phil Reiff about how to get started with your 401(k) if 

you’re not currently enrolled or are beginning a new job.
